text:
It is a wonderful idea to build a open concept butterfly habitat to encourage the growth of the butterfly population in the park. Butterflies and other animals can come and go freely.

I spotted 6 species of butterflies and 5 species of bees, amidst other interesting insects here. There were also many birds and squirrels. It was an amazing experience! ‚≠ê

Nice section of the park with plants that attract butterflies.

Maintained by volunteers like myself every Wednesday morning.
Good to see butterflies hover around
No butterfly, just bee and ants üòÇ
